document.full_text: david ferrer advanced to the quarterfinals of the monte carlo masters by beating milos raonic 6-1, 6-3 in the third round thursday.
document.title: ferrer and ljubicic advance at monte carlo masters
lines_and_colors: david ferrer advanced to the quarterfinals of the monte carlo masters by beating milos raonic 6-1, 6-3 in the third round thursday.
